bilingual.source: Now write the four-paragraph leaflet properly, using the sub-headings.
bilingual.target: 现在用小标题正确地写四段的小册子。
她学会了如何正确地喂奶。

bilingual.source: My dad taught me how to shave properly.
bilingual.target: 我爸爸教我如何正确地刮胡子。

bilingual.source: She learned how to properly back a car.
bilingual.target: 她学会了如何正确地倒车。

bilingual.source: Do you know how to properly perform CPR?
bilingual.target: 你知道如何正确地进行心肺复苏吗？

bilingual.source: He learned how to properly ride a horse.
bilingual.target: 他学会了如何正确地骑马。

bilingual.source: Do you know how to change gear properly?
bilingual.target: 你知道如何正确地换排挡吗？

bilingual.source: The dough was too stiff to knead properly.
bilingual.target: 面团太僵硬的，无法正确地揉捏。

bilingual.source: She learned how to properly set the saddle.
bilingual.target: 她学会了如何正确地安装马鞍。

bilingual.source: Make sure the screw is countersunk properly.
bilingual.target: 确保螺钉被正确地沉头。

list.abstract: properly，英 [ˈprɒpəli]，美 [ˈprɑːpərli]。英语单词，副词。指的是正确地；满意地；彻底地。短语搭配为：“dress properly（穿着得体）” 例句为：“It will not be properly used.（它不会被正确地使用。）” properly近义词为correctly，exactly。反义词为improperly。

yingyinNormal.en: Perhaps the three of us can sit down tomorrow and talk properly.
yingyinNormal.zh: 也许明天我们三个可以坐下来好好谈谈。

yingyinNormal.en: It should be with us. We have to look after it properly. We liberated it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 它应该属于我们 我们可以打理好它，我们解放了它。

yingyinNormal.en: I'll do it properly when I get back and tear this up before you ever see it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 回来之后，我会着手操办并把这封信撕了，不让你看见。

yingyinNormal.en: That's right. We are big girls. And George and Richard are too little to play together properly.
yingyinNormal.zh: 说得没错。我们要做榜样。可是乔治和理查德太小啦，没有办法在一起玩。

yingyinNormal.en: Daddy, can we help put up the picture? You can watch and then you'll learn how to do it properly.
yingyinNormal.zh: 爸爸，我们可以帮你挂照片吗？你们就看着然后你们就知道怎么做了。

yingyinNormal.en: Daddy, can we help put up the picture? You can watch and then you'll learn how to do it properly.
yingyinNormal.zh: 爸爸，我们可以帮你挂照片吗？你们就看着然后你们就知道怎么做了。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, he did not get sick somewhere in there and it was immediately found and properly cleaned up.
yingyinNormal.zh: 它没有到处呕吐，而且立刻被发现，并妥当处理干净了。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay. This is properly none of my business, but how long do you think you‘re gonna keep seeing her?
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，这可能不关我的事，只是你认为你还会跟她好多久？

yingyinNormal.en: You're really very good at it! Am I? Oh, I can do it! Look at me! Look at me! I can ride my bike properly.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你真的骑得很好哦，佩琪。是吗？我真的做到了 看我！快看我！我真的会骑两轮自行车了。

yingyinNormal.en: You need to increase your spider intake, so he'll be able to climb ceilings properly. And eat lots of sheep bile.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你需要增加蜘蛛的摄入量，那么他就可以有能力爬上天花板了，还有多吃羊胆汁。

yingyinNormal.en: That won't be necessary. We'll turn over everything immediately. Once we're properly compensated for our time and effort.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那不必了，我们会立即移交所有文件，条件是必须补偿我们付出的时间和辛劳。

yingyinNormal.en: What's all this crying about? George and Richard always cry when they play together. They are just too little to play properly.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们两个人为什么哭了呢？乔治和理查德只要在一起玩，他们就总是会哭。他们两个太小啦，没有办法在一起玩。

yingyinNormal.en: But it's when you don't wash properly, or even worse, only wash with water, that how you dry your hands can make all the difference.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但是如果你不正确洗手，更糟的是，只用清水洗手，如何擦干手就会影响很大了。

yingyinNormal.en: Yes, but with a very long gap in the middle. We only met properly a few days ago and now you want to spend the rest of your life with me?
yingyinNormal.zh: 没错，可中间断了很长时间的联系，直到几天前我们才再次相遇，而你这就说想跟我共度余生了。

yingyinNormal.en: Would George be taken to hospital and given medicine? No, George just has to go to bed. Oh, so George is not really properly ill. That's disgusting.
yingyinNormal.zh: 乔治是不是会被送到医院里去，还要吃药治疗？不用，乔治只要上床休息就好了。所以乔治并不是真的生病了对不对？你这样实在是太恶心了！

yingyinNormal.en: You'll attack me the moment I let you go. No I won't. You would think an evil super-villain would learn how to properly lie. I bet it's the one-inch man.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一旦放了你，你就会袭击我。不，我不会。你应该知道一个穷凶极恶的恶棍通常都会学习如何撒谎。我敢打赌一定是那个一英寸高的人。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, you'll be happy to know that if you wash your hands properly with soap, nearly all traces of bacteria will be removed, regardless of how you dry them.
yingyinNormal.zh: 其实无论你怎么擦干手，只要用肥皂洗手，几乎细菌就会一干二净。

yingyinNormal.en: Mr. Chairman, we need all these case files so that we can properly represent the client's interests, and Mr. Gardner and Ms. Lockhart are actively delaying...
yingyinNormal.zh: 主席先生，我们需要所有的案件卷宗，这样我们才能完全代表委托人的利益，加德纳先生和洛克哈特女士在故意拖延...

yingyinNormal.en: Here it is. The Polyjuice Potion. Properly brewed, the Polyjuice Potion allows the drinker to transform himself temporarily into the physical form of another.
yingyinNormal.zh: 找到了。所谓的变身水，只要作出正确的调配，这种魔药就可以让喝下的人暂时的完全变成另外一个人的样子。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets》

yingyinNormal.en: And because our need to be right can be more important than our need to find out what's true, we like to believe our own opinions without properly stress-testing them.
yingyinNormal.zh: 因为自我正确的需要可能比真相更重要，对我们自己的观点，我们喜欢不加审视地相信。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: appropriately for the circumstances; suitably or respectably

examination_example.sentence: Certain artifacts are especially vulnerable because some pioneers in plastic art didn't always know how to mix ingredients <highlight>properly</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有些人工制品特别脆弱，因为一些造型艺术的先驱并不总是知道如何正确混合成分。

examination_example.sentence: Restrictions  are a response to the absence of a larger effort to <highlight>properly</highlight> enforce existing regulations.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些限制是对缺乏更大力度来适当执行现有法规的回应。

examination_example.sentence: We need to learn how to evaluate them <highlight>properly</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们需要学习如何正确地评估它们。

sense_info_list.en: this is the first day she has felt properly well

examination_example.sentence: I could <highlight>properly</highlight> be in the same camp as Emma Marris on the issue of zoos.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在动物园的问题上，我完全可以和艾玛·马里斯站在同一阵营。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: They may not be taught how to <highlight>properly</highlight> interact with overseas partners.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们可能没有被教导如何与海外合作伙伴进行恰当地互动。

sense_info_list.en: this is the first day she has felt properly well

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: The man parked but didn't put on the handbrake of his car <highlight>properly</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这名男子停好车了，但没有把手刹拉好。

examination_example.sentence: What is said to happen when IT is functioning <highlight>properly</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 据其所说，当IT功能正常时，会发生什么？

sense_info_list.en: appropriately for the circumstances; suitably or respectably

examination_example.sentence: By imitating the behavior of <highlight>properly</highlight> brought-up human beings.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 通过模仿有教养的人的行为。

examination_example.sentence: You wouldn't think that's the kind of thing a <highlight>properly</highlight> brought-up person would do.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你不会认为这是一个有教养的人会做的事。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: appropriately for the circumstances; suitably or respectably

examination_example.sentence: Feeling fearful is healthy because it helps you slow down and evaluate risks <highlight>properly</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 感到恐惧是健康的，因为它有助于你放慢速度，正确评估风险。

examination_example.sentence: If <highlight>properly</highlight> administered, a kitemark on terms and conditions could help people know what exactly they are signing up to.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果管理得当，条款和条件上的标记可以帮助人们确切地知道他们正在注册什么。

examination_example.sentence: Always get rid of your rubbish <highlight>properly</highlight> and recycle waste (e.g., glass, paper) where possible.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 始终正确处理垃圾，并尽可能回收废物（如玻璃、纸张）。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: But when your children choose <highlight>properly</highlight>, be sure to praise them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是当你的孩子选择得当的时候，一定要表扬他们。

examination_example.sentence: A smoke alarm is only good if it's working <highlight>properly</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 烟雾报警器只有在正常工作时才有用。
